title: John Lee Hooker - Blues Is The Healer (10-CD-Box) (2005) [FLAC]
description:
10 CD Box - Collection - unfortunately without liner notes. So there are no informations about date, place and lineup of the recordings.

CDs 1 to 8 early recordings, probably in the 1940's and 1950's. Most of the just JLH and his guitar and footstomping. Some with second guitar, bass or piano.

CD 9 contains studio recordings with band - probably in the Sixties

CD 10 sounds like an live recording with band without audience


logfiles included



John Lee Hooker: Blues Is The Healer
